import React,{useState} from 'react'; import { FaPlus,FaMinus,FaDivide,FaEquals,FaTimes,FaPercent,FaRegTrashAlt} from "react-icons/fa"; const Calculator = () => { const [state1, setstate1] = useState(""); const click=(e)=>{ setstate1(state1.concat(e.target.value)); } const clear=()=>{ setstate1("") } const deletebtn=()=>{ setstate1(state1.length[0]-1) } return ( <>

Calculator

{state1}

) } export default Calculator;
